Description.Text:
The Hotel Hippodrome is located in the heart of the Old City of Istanbul, in the historical Sultanahmet district. With such a great central location, you have the advantage of being within walking distance of many fabulous tourist attractions, such as the Blue Mosque, Hagia Sophia, the Topkapi Palace, the Basilica Cistern, the Grand Bazaar, and the Spice Bazaar.

With wonderful views of the Blue Mosque and the Marmara Sea, the Hotel Hippodrome was a former Ottoman house, which has been transformed into a modern hotel, whilst retaining the style and atmosphere of the old Ottoman retreat.

Hippodrome offers 36 guestrooms. Televisions come with satellite television channels. Wireless Internet access is provided along with multi-line phones. Bathrooms include slippers, makeup/shaving mirrors, designer toiletries, and hair dryers. Other amenities include minibars, air conditioning, and complimentary bottled water. Amenities available on request include irons/ironing boards and wake-up calls. Housekeeping is provided. Others amenity like Dry cleaning, Lobby and Reception are also provided by this property.

The Sultanahmet district is the centre of Old Istanbul, home to many of the citys most famous attractions. The district is named after Sultan Ahmed I, who ordered the construction of the Sultan Ahmed Mosque, also known as the Blue Mosque. Other attractions include the Ayasofya (Hagia Sophia), Topkapi Palace, Byzantine Hippodrome, and Basilica Cistern.

Single Room - Single Room offers double or twin beds. Ottoman-style furnishings and decor in shades of cream and coffee. Air conditioning, cable television, complimentary wireless Internet, multi-line phone, minibar, and slippers. Bathroom with shower, makeup mirror, hair dryer, and designer toiletries. Room also consists Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Clothes dryer, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Room service, Valet service, Tea and coffee making facilities.
Double or Twin Room - Double or Twin Room offers double or twin beds. Ottoman-style furnishings and decor in shades of cream and coffee. View of the Marmara Sea and Blue Mosque. Air conditioning, cable television, complimentary wireless Internet, multi-line phone, minibar, and slippers. Bathroom with shower, makeup mirror, hair dryer, and designer toiletries. Room also cosnsits Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Clothes dryer, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Room service, Valet service, Tea and coffee making facilities.
Triple Room - Triple Room offers 3 single beds or one double bed and one single bed. Ottoman-style furnishings and decor in shades of cream and coffee. Air conditioning, cable television, complimentary wireless Internet, multi-line phone, minibar, and slippers. Bathroom with jetted tub, shower, makeup mirror, hair dryer, and designer toiletries. Room also cosnsits Alarm clock, Balcony / Terrace, Clothes dryer, Iron / Ironing board, Kettle, Non-smoking rooms, Refrigerator, Room service, Valet service, Tea and coffee making facilities.
